description.value:
The Weird Sister

They threw themselves further and further into a frenzy as pungent smoke filled their lungs,

They danced and danced in strange jerking motions that contorted their bodies until I thought their bones might snap.

The drums swelled and the shamisen strings slapped with a fury I had never heard before.

Then one of them drew a shamisen and began slicing at the other dancers, leaving fine red lines across their bodies

Crimson streaks began to paint the walls as they continued to dance, creating a beautifully macabre scene.

I found myself mesmerized, slowly nodding to the rhythm.

Before I knew it, I was entranced and flung myself into the fray and the hot lash of steel struck my skin.

My paint, my pigment joined the communal pool that was forming.

It was explained to me later that this was an offering to one of Myn's children, Aelin, so they may be protected from illness in the upcoming year.

That year I had nary a sniffle.

- Unknown

Of the children ofÂ Myn, Aelin is considered the most esoteric and bizarre. Her domain is that of occult magic, her followers performing strange and powerful magic that defies what many would consider natural and normal. Aelin's followers claim that she is benevolent and willing to impart her power upon her followers even for mundane tasks so long as the price for the magic is paid, the prices ranging from simple burnt offerings to ritualistic sacrifices to bloodletting to forfeiting some of one's mortal possessions.

Edicts

  • Find the secrets of the strange things of the world
  • Bend reality to your making
  • Carve your own path

Anathema

  • Complacency
  • Rigid rules

Areas of Concern

  • Occult magic
  • Strange phenomena
